name: create-landing-page
description: Default folder structure for create landing page using tailwindcss

scripts.dev: npx concurrently --kill-others "npx tailwindcss -i src/css/_style.css -o src/css/style.css --watch" "node server"
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/css && npx minify src/index.html > dist/index.html && npx minify src/css/style.css > dist/css/style.css && cp -r src/assets dist

author: thoanngo2 <thomas@dtn.com.vn>
